page.title: 05Industry Today
page.content: Our area is very much one of country villages. Industry is very light in nature. The oldest established concern appears to be Balmoral Lingerie which began trading in 1960 and expanded over the next ten years. Balmoral now employs nearly forty people and is known locally as simply the "Knicker Factory". A limited amount of new industry has taken over existing buildings or developed otherwise derelict land. The Longton Cash Register Company is now housed in the old school building. Champ Chicken,poultry supplies,and I.T. & J.A. Neilson,dairy products now use the area once occupied by the old mill. (James Yates and Darren Prescott)
